name: Streamsmas Game
description:
This was a game made over the course of two weeks for the 12 Days of Streamsmas marathon on my twitch channel! Members of the community all came together to come up with ideas and all submitted art and music for the game.

Each day we focused on a different aspect of the games design; characters, enemies, background elements, etc. This continued until we had the finished product! 

Please enjoy and to those that participated thank you very much for your hard work and for just being along for the ride and part of the community! Everyone did an amazing job!

Controls
F2 - Restart Game
R - Restart room
PgUp - Skip forward
PgDn - Skip back
Z - Jump
X - Shoot/Dash

Each character has different abilities, try holding up or down or being in the air when pressing Z or X. Experiment with each character to find the one you like!

If things get tough, try skipping back to change characters or skipping forward to see the next part of the game!

Have fun!
